mapper.select: SELECT ev.VERIFICATION_ID, ev.EMAIL, ev.VERIFICATION_CODE, ev.IS_VERIFIED, ev.EXPIRES_AT, ev.CREATED_AT, u.USER_ID, u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL as USER_EMAIL FROM EMAIL_VERIFICATIONS ev LEFT JOIN USERS u ON ev.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE ev.EMAIL = #{email} AND ev.VERIFICATION_CODE = #{verificationCode} AND ev.IS_VERIFIED = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EMAIL_VERIFICATIONS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND IS_VERIFIED = 0
